org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl.rules

Interface Operation<R,C extends Operation<?,?>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileOperation, TestOperation<C>, ValueOperation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    File_Ancestors, File_Children, File_Descendents, File_Parent, File_Self, Test_And, Test_Count, Test_Match, Test_Not, Test_Or, Value_FileMetadata, Value_Literal, Value_SystemProperty

    public interface Operation<R,C extends Operation<?,?>>
    Operations operate in the context of a filesystem entity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R[] operate(FileContext fileContext)
      Evaluate the operation at runtime given a filesystem entity context.
      void setConstraints(C... constraints)
      Set the constraints of this operation.

    • Method Detail

      • setConstraints

        void setConstraints(C... constraints)
        Set the constraints of this operation.

        Constraint setup is intended to occur at initialization, in response to a specific Package Description Preferences file that defines the constraints.

        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints to set on the operation

      • operate

        R[] operate(FileContext fileContext)
     throws OperationException
        Evaluate the operation at runtime given a filesystem entity context.
        Parameters:
        fileContext - The file context to perform the operation on.
        Returns:
        The result(s) of the performed operation.
        Throws:
        OperationException
